qas.question: In which location did Mahatma Gandhi spend the final 144 days of his life?
In which city is the Gandhi Smriti located?
On which date was Mahatma Gandhi killed?
In what location was Mahatma Gandhi cremated?
The Raj Ghat was designed by what architect?

context: <a0_0>Gandhi Smriti<a0_0/> in <a1_0>New Delhi<a1_0/> is the location where Mahatma Gandhi spent the last 144 days of his life and was assassinated on <a2_0>30 January 1948<a2_0/>. <a3_0>Rajghat<a3_0/> is the place where Mahatma Gandhi was cremated on 31 January 1948 after his assassination and his ashes were buried and make it a final resting place beside the sanctity of the Yamuna River. The Raj Ghat in the shape of large square platform with black marble was designed by architect <a4_0>Vanu Bhuta<a4_0/>.
